title: S3 to EventBridge
description: Publish events directly from S3 to EventBridge and send notifications to SNS when an object is created.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This creates an S3 bucket, EventBridge rule and SNS topic. S3 publishes events directly to EventBridge and sends a notification to the SNS topic when an object is created in the bucket.
